1.content:
It was a warm summers evening in Los angeles, Laughter could be heard on one of the many beaches that characterised the famous city, as five people walked along the sands, barefooted.

first one you'd notice would be the brown haired guy walking backwards while talking to his friends he wore a hawaiian shirt that was open to reveal his tanned bare chest, as well as a pair of palm tree patterned shorts. his hair hung in messy fashion over his forhead, just a few bangs going lower then his eyes. His friends just laughed along with him, knowing full well that this behaviour was normal for him. The boy's name was Nathan, Nate to his friends.

One of the girls in the group laughed at a joke of his, her emerald eyes gave off a sweet persona, that, coupled with her bubblegum pink hair, convinced anyone she met of her friendly personality. she wore a thin jacket over a bikini and shorts, which showed off her flawless skin and athletic body.

the third member of the group, and arguably the tallest, wore a sleeveless shirt with a high collar, along with 3/4 pants. his red hair went down to his shoulders, covering one of his hazel coloured eyes. he looked slightly more serious then the others, but still laughed along merrily to Nathans Jokes. this is Hunter Nico, 'Nick' to his friends.

fourth in the group was a young girl of 14, with blonde hair and blue eyes. she stood a bit shorter then Mari, wearing a one piece bathing suit and a sun jacket. she looked timid but friendly and was an overall pretty girl, this girl was known as Elena, her beauty was however nowhere near the beauty of the fifth girl.

said fifth person was a young, 16 year old girl with beauty far beyond her years, her hazel brown eyes shone against her pale, flawless complexion, while her athletic, lean body was clad in a purple bikini top and short shorts, her long black hair cascaded down to her lower back. this girl was Bethany 'Beth.'


Nathan continiued to joke around before he tripped over something in the sand.

"huh?! ah!!" he yelled, falling flat on his back, much to the amusment of the others.

"we told you you'd fall over doing that Nate." said Mari, giggling.

"it wasn't my fault, i tripped over something" he said, rummaging through the sand to look for the object that tripped him, pulling out an old, worn out tomb.

"whats that?" asked Elena, looking at the book in wonder.

"hmm, looks like an old tomb of some kind...hold on" said Nate, opening the book.

"whats it say Nate?" asked Nick.

"huh...thats weird...theres no title. just an author called Jaden....wait...is that my name?" he replied, flicking through the pages. "hey, we're all in here!" he said, looking at...
1.title: Book on the beach

info.brief_description: you and your friends discover a book, strange thing is, you're in it!
info.description:
you are one of five friends.

Nathan Renton: a 15 year old joker, with light blue eyes and brown hair, streaked with black. Nathan loves to joke around and has a jovial outlook on life. he has a crush on Mari, but would never admit it.

Maria Duvallier: as her name sudjests, her father is french. she is a bubbly 16 year old girl with long, pink dyed hair, and emerald green eyes. she is a cheerie, friendly girl and loves to make others smile. she knows about Nathan's crush on her, thinking him sweet for it.

Hunter Nico: Hunter Nico, or 'Nick' to his friends, is the leader of the gang. he is 16 with dark red hair and brown eyes. he is the one who looks out for the others, and keeps Nathan out of trouble.

Elena Pierce: a spritely 14 year old blonde, with big blue eyes and a go getter attitude. she has a huge crush on hunter, but is worried about admitting it because of the age difference between them.

Bethany Karrel: a 16 year old beauty, with flowing black hair and brown eyes, she also has a crush on Hunter, but she is confident enough to admit it, unlike her 'other intrests'.
